ComicInfo.Series: Danger Doll Squad Presents: Amalgama Lives
ComicInfo.Summary:
Amalgama may have reached Earth, but can she keep herself together – literally – long enough to get her revenge??
Mash-up of the popular Danger Doll Universe characters: Zombie Tramp, Vampblade, and DollFace!

ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
